Although the bear looks very large and powerful already, you know it's a gentle giant and want to see it grow much bigger from its current size.

Holding the ruby, you wish for the bear to grow, and it immediately lets out a short, deep grunt as it starts to swell bigger and bigger. At first it adds on inch by inch, nuzzling you affectionately as you try to reciprocate by hugging its growing body and trying to stumble backwards. Soon its size and strength are too much for you however, and you fall back onto your bottom, smiling up and up at the bear, its eyes now closed in what appears to be pleasure as it grows up and out of its enclosure, adding foot after foot in height with each passing moment. The huge and growing ursine soon has to step out of its pit-like enclosure, large, heavy paws treading the concrete as other zoogoers take one glance at the larger-than-life bear and start to flee. This only broadens your smile, because you know that despite its size the bear wouldn't (intentionally) harm a fly.

The giant bear opens its eyes and lets out another loud grunt as its growth spurt comes to a halt. Its warm, friendly eyes survey its new surroundings, clearly intrigued yet also joyed that it's grown so large. You take a moment to revel in the fact as well: The grizzly is now so big that it towers over the zoo and its exhibits, casting a large shadow on an enclosure of some interested yet slightly terrified zebras.

Now out into the zoo's main walkway yourself, you wonder what the mighty bear would say now that it's grown so big, but on the other hand, you could always play into your immediate desires, as well as the bear's, and grow it even bigger right now...

Dan concentrates and lifts the ruby higher, the gem starting to glow bright; from far away, the gargantuan rabbit begins to tense up, closing its eyes, its ears flicking nervously, before it begins to ripple up and up in size, swelling bigger over the entire street! You both watch in amazement as the growing rabbit gets bigger and bigger, rocketing up to over 200 feet in size, then lurching up even larger than that, to over 400, doubling its size in moments! It wriggles its lengthening whiskers and thumps its foot approvingly, as if asking for more, even as its paw slams over a deal of the neighborhood, shaking the rooftops of homes down and up the street; it gets what it asks for, as the rabbit bulges up even bigger, putting its ears back happily, inflating to over 900 whopping feet, then half a staggering mile!!

You both back away more and more, watching with the rest of the neighborhood as the mile-sized rabbit gets even larger, swelling warmly to over 3 miles, then 6, then 12, getting so big now that its body takes up as much space as the uptown district; it grows clear into the city limits, its bunny rump pushing into and over the local park, entire coffee shops and intersections getting harmlessly mowed over by an ever-growing wall of soft lepus bulk.

At over 18 miles in height, and 26 miles in length, the rabbit is bigger than a city, its head nosing on clouds curiously, trying to nibble them as they drift along its massively huge body.

Lowering the ruby, Dan takes a breath, and turns to his friend, extending an arm out to the horizon-spanning bunny, just to show off.

"Hows that random, you're like 40ft tall....." you stop speaking as Dave's whole body trembles and his height surges form the tiny 40 foot point to a staggering 120 feet, then 150, 200, and finally 250 feet tall. At which point his feet are almost as big as your destroyed house.

"Hah care to try again little guy!" Comes the booming Giants voice with such power that it almost deafens you. "Sure! I wish you were you were the size of a....a....Cell!" You scream at your friend. You don't care how random the his growth was, cells were infinitesimal, he may have ballooned up over 250 times the size you put him at but even if he grew 1 million times the size of a cell he'd still be to small to see.

"You little..." But Daves reply is cut short as his height diminishes at such speed that he literally creates a vortex on wind on his way down. You watch and in only 3 seconds you're friend goes from monster to miniature, and then disappears from sight.

"That settles that maybe I'll unshrink him later...now what to do....
1533122112.title: Its based partially on wish strength and other ...

choices: He's done for now, till you make another wish
15331221121.content:
Turning away from where your friend disappeared you begin to think out loud. "Okay, what to do, maybe I'll make a giant girl. or a giant cat. Ohhh how about a giant cat girl! Yeah that could work....hey whats that sound?" your thoughts are interrupted by sudden rushing wind and sound like small tornado exploding. "No, you gotta be kidding me, I mean how am I supposed to shrink him if he's just gonna grow back...stronger...crap, power of wish, times the number of wishes, times and numbers of times he's grown before. That must be the equation." you say to no in particular.

"So basically he's grown like 4 times now because of 4 wishes, so 16 times the base power would be his height...no this stupid ruby wouldn't dare set it up like that would it?" You train of thought and ramblings would have continues save for the massive explosion of air that sent you flying, that much forced caused from just going from cell size to normal must mean...looking down as you fly through the air your fear is confirmed.

At first its not visible but Dave quickly grown from cell sized to the size of an ant, in only a handful of seconds. Ten seconds later he gone from 1/2 inch to 8 feet. Smiling and looking down of the world the small giant begins to laugh as his height soars rapidly past 80 feet, then 160 feet comes and goes, then 400, 600,800 feet. At which point His massive feet have obliterated your house as well as your garden and nearby tree's.

"MORE, MORE! I must be BIGGER!" roars the massive giant as his whole body slows growing but only for a second. Looking down you realize the blast of wind that sent you flying must have put you close to 8 miles up, not only was your friend barely visible but you're fairly certain you could see aircraft from here. Looking back down you watch the giants growth stall for a second. Then in another massive growth spurt your friend expands from 800 feet to 3,000ft, then finally a 1 mile. "Is he done?" you wonder.

But far from being done you watch as the titanic Dave expands from 1 mile to 2, 4, 6, 8 miles, he can now see you at eye level. "HA, Thanks for the size boost buddy. TELL YA WHAT! You keep making wishes and I won't destroy the planet hows that sound?" Sounds like bullshit you think after all with one wish you can undo everything again, unfortunately Dave probably be a lot bigger than 9 feet in the reset world.

"Grow, Bigger! Don't stop body! I want to be HUGE!!" roars the Dave as he again grows from 8 miles to 10, then 12, his massive feet have wiped out large portions of the nearby suburb by now. "BIGGER! Hey buddy better make another wish to undo THIS!" Dave shouts as he jumps up and lands on massive ass crushing everything in a about 3 miles around and sending a shock wave into the nearby populated area's.

And again without warning 12 miles turns into 14, 18, 20, 25 miles

just how big will he get?
15331221121.title: Dave's grows immensly big very quickly

153312211211.content:
"Oversized Jerk." you mumble to yourself as you continue to spiral downwards towards earth. Good thing you were immortal/invulnerable or the fall would probably have killed you. Upon landing you begin to think about how to undo Dave's massive rampage, after all you have the ruby you can make any wish you want, but you don't want to be rid of your friend forever. You just need a way to shrink him long enough to have a conversation with him and work out how the two of you can both enjoy this ruby and its powers.

"Okay so shrinking him down to microscopic takes to much power he'll just grow back. Lets see if there's a sweet spot. I wish dave was only one foot tall." You say aloud seconds before you hit the ground sending up a huge amount of dust and debris followed by a thunderous crash. Right immortal, invincible, doesn't mean physics don't exist you think to yourself as you rise up and walk out of the small crater you had made on impact. Looking around Dave doesn't appear to be anywhere in sight.

"Hey, what do ya know it worked. he must have grown back to a reasonable height. Now all I have to do is..." but you find your self-congratulations cut short by the far off rumblings. Then off in the distance you can see it. A massive figure rising higher into the sky with each passing moment.
quickly passing 5 miles and then 10,15,20 and 25 miles Dave's massive frame again towers over the country side. Then in a sudden surge his form expands from 25 miles to 50.

"Good try little man, got any more wishes besides just shrinking me?" Comes the massive taunting of your friend. "Dammit, I wish Dave was 1 inch tall." and as soon as you speak it a brilliant flash of light pulses from your friends body and suddenly he's not there anymore. Or at least not right away. But sure enough as few seconds tick by you watch as Dave's massive frame re-appears again, growing even faster than last time the massive giant has already passed his former height of 50 miles and is closing in on 100 miles.

"BOORING!" Comes the call of the massive man as he looks out over the country side. Unable to find you he simply begins to entertain himself by stomping flat some nearby mountains. "OH come ON! I wish he was a centimeter tall!" You practically scream and once again with a flash of light your friend disappears. "That had to do it right? ri....." you look again at the same spot you knew Dave would re-appear if he did and sure enough the massive giant emerges again this time sailing right past 50 miles, into 100 and finally in one enormous surge of growth stopping at 275 miles tall. The massive giant can't help but smile downwards toward the earth.

"Don't mind me little man you go ahead and keep trying, its kinda fun actually." Come Daves mocking words. "Fine, you know what you wanna be big! be BIG! Matter of fact I wish I was 500 miles tall!!" you scream at the ruby thinking that if you can't shrink your friend you might as well have some fun. "Also I wish my the pet rabbits were 30 miles tall. I wish that dogs were immortal. I wish there were some women this size to share in the fun. and I wish that everybody who isn't Dave or me would have their size randomly altered between 1 foot tall and thousands of miles tall!" You finish making your wishes and look outward to see what changes your mad wish spree will bring about.

You see...
153312211211.title: He's done for now, till you make another wish

1533122112112.content:
Suddenly the ruby releases a bunch of small red orbs. At first they just float there pulsating with light. You lean in to examine one but suddenly the light intensifies and it explodes in a brilliant flash of red energy. When the light clears and you can see again you immediately notice two things happening. First your body begins to expand rapidly, you watch as the country side around begins to change dramatically. Trees and hillsides become small carpets of green and brown, while nearby cities turn into puddles of gray looking concrete.

"Oh, It must be the first wish. So that means each orb is a wish. Wonder why it did that." Then you hear it. The sound of Dave moaning in ecstasy. You turn and watch from your growing stand point of nearly 300 miles as your friend's form doubles in size going from 275 to 550 miles in a matter of seconds. When you both finish growing he turns towards you.

"See that wasn't so bad. Now make another wish and lets have some FUN!" Your buddy suggests as he begins looking around the country side.
"Hey! What are these?" Dave asks as he bends down and gives you a look at his massively oversize manhood. Jeese apparently his ego wasn't the only that grew, his dick had to be miles upon miles long at this height but proportionately it looked like it was a good 16 inches, even soft. The dangling manhood hangs down far past the bending Dave's knees.

"For the love, I wish we had some shorts." you say and suddenly the ruby glows read again. but it doesn't release a light this time instead it draws some light from the other floating orbs that Dave has now gathered up in his hand. Then suddenly a pair of shorts materializes out of thin air comfortably covering both you and your friend.

"What, OH, are these the wishes you made, huh that's new. Oh OH YEAH!" Dave says as he stop wondering for a moment and proceeds to go from 550 miles high 750 miles. His new shorts are instantly shredded and his manhood again hangs out prominently for the world to see.

"Dammit! was the point of wishing for the pants then!" you say a bit angry as dave turns to you his enormous dick almost at the same level as you. "Huh, if these are wishes then what happens if I....hmmm?" Dave looks at the tiny glowing spheres and then without warning promptly eats them.

"What are you doing! you don't even know what...that...will...do...." you voice trails off as you watch your buddies body suddenly glow bright red. then a second later an immense explosion of light blinds you.

"Great now whaa..." You begin to wonder aloud, but as the light clears you can only stare. There where your buddy was once standing is just an enormous crater. "HOLY CRAP! What happened?" You wonder aloud and begin looking around but suddenly the sky darkens and you turn around to see a whole new problem.

The massive form of Dave now towers over the planet. He's floating there just off to the left of the earth, smiling. "Hey buddy, Keep those wishes coming!" Comes the massive planet sized Dave's command.

"Well dammit, now what?" you say looking down at thh ruby
1533122112112.title: Something weird happens
